languages.text: {n}Блюститель решительно мотает головой.{/n} "Никак нет! Наоборот — отличился. Этот отсек всегда был проблемным, и Мастер дисциплины назначила меня сюда, высоко оценив мои профессиональные качества. Заслужить доверие леди Иокасты — большая честь для меня".

traits.locale_text: {n}Блюститель решительно мотает головой.{/n} "Никак нет! Наоборот — отличился. Этот отсек всегда был проблемным, и Мастер дисциплины назначила меня сюда, высоко оценив мои профессиональные качества. Заслужить доверие леди Иокасты — большая честь для меня".

languages.text: {n}Frensoe shakes his head fiercely.{/n} "No, Lord Captain, quite the opposite: I was commended for my service. This compartment has always been a troublesome one, and the Master-at-Arms assigned me here because she thought highly of my merits. I am honoured to have earned Mistress Sauerback's trust."
languages.original_text: {n}Блюститель решительно мотает головой.{/n} "Никак нет! Наоборот — отличился. Этот отсек всегда был проблемным, и Мастер дисциплины назначила меня сюда, высоко оценив мои профессиональные качества. Заслужить доверие леди Иокасты — большая честь для меня".

traits.locale_text: {n}Frensoe shakes his head fiercely.{/n} "No, Lord Captain. It's the opposite — I was commended for my service. This compartment has always been a troublesome one, and the Master-at-Arms assigned me here because she thought highly of my merits. I am honoured to have earned Mistress Sauerback's trust."
{n}With a fierce pride, the enforcer bellows,{/n} "Negative! It is my honour and my pleasure to serve the dynasty in any position! Duty is duty anywhere!"

{n}Frensoe shakes his head fiercely.{/n} "No, Lord Captain, quite the opposite: I was commended for my service. This compartment has always been a troublesome one, and the Master-at-Arms assigned me here because she thought highly of my merits. I am honoured to have earned Mistress Sauerback's trust."
{n}With a fierce pride, the captain bellows,{/n} "Negative! It is my honour to serve the dynasty, no matter the post! Duty is duty anywhere!"

{n}Frensoe shakes his head fiercely.{/n} "No, Lord Captain, quite the opposite: I was commended for my service. This compartment has always been a troublesome one, and the Master-at-Arms assigned me here because she thought highly of my merits. I am honoured to have earned Mistress Sauerback's trust."

{n}Frensoe shakes his head fiercely.{/n} "No, Lord Captain, quite the opposite: I was commended for my service. This compartment has always been a troublesome one, and the Master-at-Arms assigned me here because she thought highly of my merits. I am honoured to have earned Mistress Sauerback's trust."

languages.text: {n}Frensoe menea la cabeza vigorosamente.{/n} «No, Lord Capitán, más bien al contrario: me felicitaron por mi servicio. Este compartimento siempre ha sido muy problemático, y la maestra de armas me destinó aquí porque tenía en alta estima mis méritos. Para mí es un honor haberme ganado la confianza de la maestra Sauerback».
languages.original_text: {n}Frensoe shakes his head fiercely.{/n} "No, Lord Captain, quite the opposite: I was commended for my service. This compartment has always been a troublesome one, and the Master-at-Arms assigned me here because she thought highly of my merits. I am honoured to have earned Mistress Sauerback's trust."

traits.locale_text: {n}Frensoe menea la cabeza vigorosamente.{/n} «No, Lord Capitán, más bien al contrario: me felicitaron por mi servicio. Este compartimento siempre ha sido muy problemático, y la maestra de armas me destinó aquí porque tenía en alta estima mis méritos. Para mí es un honor haberme ganado la confianza de la maestra Sauerback».

languages.text: {n}フレンソーは激しく首を振る。{/n} 「いいえ、その逆です。私の任務は称賛に値するものです。この区画はいつもトラブルの絶えない区画で、マスター・アット・アームズは私の功績を高く評価してここに配属されたのです。ザウアーバック様の信頼を得ることができて光栄です」
languages.original_text: {n}Frensoe shakes his head fiercely.{/n} "No, Lord Captain, quite the opposite: I was commended for my service. This compartment has always been a troublesome one, and the Master-at-Arms assigned me here because she thought highly of my merits. I am honoured to have earned Mistress Sauerback's trust."

traits.locale_text: {n}フレンソーは激しく首を振る。{/n} 「いいえ、その逆です。私の任務は称賛に値するものです。この区画はいつもトラブルの絶えない区画で、マスター・アット・アームズは私の功績を高く評価してここに配属されたのです。ザウアーバック様の信頼を得ることができて光栄です」

languages.text: {n}弗伦索猛地摇着头。{/n}“不，舰长大人。恰恰相反，这是戒律大师对我的嘉奖。这片区域一直都麻烦不断，戒律大师之所以派我到这里来，是因为她对我的评价很高。我很荣幸能赢得苏尔贝克女士的信任。”
languages.original_text: {n}Frensoe shakes his head fiercely.{/n} "No, Lord Captain, quite the opposite: I was commended for my service. This compartment has always been a troublesome one, and the Master-at-Arms assigned me here because she thought highly of my merits. I am honoured to have earned Mistress Sauerback's trust."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗伦索猛地摇着头。{/n}“不，舰长大人。恰恰相反，这是戒律大师对我的嘉奖。这片区域一直都麻烦不断，戒律大师之所以派我到这里来，是因为她对我的评价很高。我很荣幸能赢得苏尔贝克女士的信任。”

languages.text: {n}Frensoe schüttelt heftig den Kopf.{/n} "Nein, Lord Captain, ganz im Gegenteil. Ich wurde für meine Arbeit belobigt. Dieses Modul war schon immer schwierig, und die Waffenmeisterin hat mich aufgrund meiner Verdienste hier stationiert. Es ist eine Ehre, Meisterin Sauerbacks Vertrauen zu genießen."
languages.original_text: {n}Frensoe shakes his head fiercely.{/n} "No, Lord Captain, quite the opposite: I was commended for my service. This compartment has always been a troublesome one, and the Master-at-Arms assigned me here because she thought highly of my merits. I am honoured to have earned Mistress Sauerback's trust."

traits.locale_text: {n}Frensoe schüttelt heftig den Kopf.{/n} "Nein, Lord Captain, ganz im Gegenteil. Ich wurde für meine Arbeit belobigt. Dieses Modul war schon immer schwierig, und die Waffenmeisterin hat mich aufgrund meiner Verdienste hier stationiert. Es ist eine Ehre, Meisterin Sauerbacks Vertrauen zu genießen."

languages.text: {n}Frensoe secoue énergiquement la tête.{/n} « Non, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, bien au contraire. On m'a félicité pour mes états de service. Voyez-vous, ce compartiment a toujours posé problème, et la capitaine d'armes m'a affecté ici parce qu'elle tenait mes talents en haute estime. C'est un honneur pour moi que d'avoir mérité la confiance de maîtresse Sauerback. »
languages.original_text: {n}Frensoe shakes his head fiercely.{/n} "No, Lord Captain, quite the opposite: I was commended for my service. This compartment has always been a troublesome one, and the Master-at-Arms assigned me here because she thought highly of my merits. I am honoured to have earned Mistress Sauerback's trust."

traits.locale_text: {n}Frensoe secoue énergiquement la tête.{/n} « Non, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, bien au contraire. On m'a félicité pour mes états de service. Voyez-vous, ce compartiment a toujours posé problème, et la capitaine d'armes m'a affecté ici parce qu'elle tenait mes talents en haute estime. C'est un honneur pour moi que d'avoir mérité la confiance de maîtresse Sauerback. »

languages.text: {n}Frensoe, şiddetle başını sallıyor.{/n} "Hayır Lord Kaptan. Aksine hizmetlerim karşısında takdir kazandım. Bu kompartıman, her daim başa bela olmuştur. Silahtar da hünerlerimi takdir ettiği için beni buraya atadı. Sauerback Hanım'ın güvenini kazanmaktan onur duyuyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Frensoe shakes his head fiercely.{/n} "No, Lord Captain, quite the opposite: I was commended for my service. This compartment has always been a troublesome one, and the Master-at-Arms assigned me here because she thought highly of my merits. I am honoured to have earned Mistress Sauerback's trust."
